snippet: Western countries should not comfort themselves with the myth that Asian students perform well because of systems that favor memorization over creativity, the organization’s education chief said.
lead_paragraph: Western countries should not comfort themselves with the myth that Asian students perform well because of systems that favor memorization over creativity, the organization’s education chief said.

headline.main: O.E.C.D. Warns West on Education Gaps
headline.print_headline: O.E.C.D. Warns West on Education Gaps
